org.mini2Dx.core.audio

Class CrossFadingMusicLoop

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mini2Dx.core.audio.CrossFadingMusicLoop

  • public class CrossFadingMusicLoop
extends java.lang.Object
    Implements a loopable music track and crossfades into itself. Note: It is required to call update() each frame when using this object

    • Constructor Detail

      • CrossFadingMusicLoop

        public CrossFadingMusicLoop(com.badlogic.gdx.files.FileHandle musicFile,
                    float crossfadeTime,
                    float crossfadeDuration)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        musicFile - The FileHandle for the music to be looped
        crossfadeTime - The time (in seconds) at which the crossfade begins at the end of the track
        crossfadeDuration - The duration of the crossfade in seconds
